sentences.en: He was a man of stupendous stamina and energy.
sentences.cn: 他是个有着超强耐力、精力充沛的人。

sentences.en: Of course Leo was intensely interested in this stupendous and unequalled sight.
sentences.cn: 利奥自然对这种惊人的不平等现象极为关注.

sentences.en: On that day, the realm of France received on parchment a stupendous accession.
sentences.cn: 那一天, 法国的领土在羊皮纸的文件上获得了绝大的扩张.

sentences.en: Some buldings leaned away from ground zero as though struck by a wind of stupendous proportions.
sentences.cn: 有些建筑物朝着和地面零点相反的方向倾斜,好像受到暴风袭击一样.

sentences.en: The Egyptian pyramids indicate considerable mechanical skill as well as a stupendous mass effort.
sentences.cn: 埃及的金字塔花费了巨大的群众力量,也表现了相当高明的力学上的技巧.

sentences.en: The fireworks were stupendous - and so was the ocean of humanity viewing them.
sentences.cn: 烟火巨大辉煌,并且观看的人也是人山人海.

sentences.en: The technology bred of science has catalyzed stupendous economic growth ( Nature )
sentences.cn: 来源于科学的技术已经引起了巨大的经济增长 ( 自然界 )

sentences.en: The technology bred of science has catalyzed stupendous economic growth.
sentences.cn: 自然科技的繁衍已经催化了惊人的经济发展.

sentences.en: Their antiquity is stupendous, dating back some 36,000 years B.C.
sentences.cn: 它们惊人的古老, 可以追溯到公元前36,000年.

sentences.en: This blood letting is a stupendous damage for both of us.
sentences.cn: 这场斗争对我们双方都是巨大损失.

sentences.en: This stupendous fragmentariness heightened the dream - like strangeness of her bridal life.
sentences.cn: 这架庞大的残骸,使她的新婚生活更变得象梦一般光怪陆离.

sentences.en: This stupendous novel keeps you gripped to the end.
sentences.cn: 这部小说精彩到让你想一口气读完。

sentences.en: This young man thinks our little home is stupendous.
sentences.cn: 这小伙子觉得咱们的房子太大了!

trans.tran_cn: 惊人的，了不起的，巨大的，有重要性的
